test-case-oidc-core-0.name: 0 - Test Case OIDC Core base (SPID Level 1)
test-case-oidc-core-0.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 1.

test-case-oidc-core-1.name: 1 - Test Case OIDC Core base (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-core-1.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 2.

test-case-oidc-offline-access-0.name: 2 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU2 (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-0.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 2 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU2 (30 days expiring rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-1.name: 3 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU3 (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-1.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 2 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU3 (30 days renewing rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-2.name: 4 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access CU2 (SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-2.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request for offline access and SPID Level 3 and Refresh Token flow for use case CU2 (30 days expiring rotation).

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-0.name: 5 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-0.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-1.name: 6 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-1.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-2.name: 7 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-2.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request without scope offline access and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_grant'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-3.name: 8 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1, SPID Level 2)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-3.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request with incorrect level order and try refresh token request with invalid grant. Expected authentication request response: invalid_request, expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-4.name: 9 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access not granted (SPID Level 1, SPID Level 3)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-denied-4.description: Executes the OIDC Authorization Code request with incorrect level order and try refresh token request. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.name: 10 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access invalid_request (parameter client_id is not present)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because of client_id not present. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.name: 11 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access invalid_request (parameter client_id invalid)
test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because of invalid client_id. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.name: 12 - Test Case OIDC Offline Access unsupported_grant_type
test-case-oidc-offline-access-invalid-re.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because of invalid client_id. Expected refresh token response: error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-1.name: 13 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (parameter request is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-1.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because parameter request is not present. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-2.name: 14 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the value of request is not a valid JWT)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-2.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the value of request is not a valid JWT. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-3.name: 15 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the signature of the request JWT is not valid)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-3.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the signature of the request JWT is not valid. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-4.name: 16 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (client_id is not present as HTTP parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-4.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because client_id is not present as HTTP parameter. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-5.name: 17 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (client_id is not present into request parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-5.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because client_id is not present into request parameter. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-6.name: 18 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the values of client_id are different)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-6.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the values of client_id are different. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-7.name: 19 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the value of client_id is not trusted)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-7.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the value of client_id is not trusted. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-8.name: 20 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (response_type is not present as HTTP parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-8.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because response_type is not present as HTTP parameter. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-9.name: 21 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (response_type is not present into request parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-9.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because response_type is not present into request parameter. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-10.name: 22 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the values of response_type are different)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-10.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the values of response_type are different. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-11.name: 23 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (response_type is different from 'code')
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-11.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because response_type is different from 'code'. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-12.name: 24 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (scope is not present as HTTP parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-12.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because scope is not present as HTTP parameter. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-13.name: 25 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (scope is not present into request parameter)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-13.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because scope is not present into request parameter. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-14.name: 26 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the values of scope are different)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-14.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the values of scope are different. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-15.name: 27 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (scope not contains 'openid')
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-15.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because scope not contains 'openid'. Expected error 'invalid_scope'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-16.name: 28 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (code_challenge is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-16.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because code_challenge is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-17.name: 29 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (code_challenge_method is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-17.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because code_challenge_method is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-18.name: 30 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (code_challenge_method is different from 'S256')
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-18.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because code_challenge_method is different from 'S256'. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-19.name: 31 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (nonce is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-19.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because nonce is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-20.name: 32 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (nonce length is less than 32 chars)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-20.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because nonce length is less than 32 chars. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-21.name: 33 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (prompt is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-21.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because prompt is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-22.name: 34 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (the value of prompt is different from ['consent', 'consent_login'])
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-22.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because the value of prompt is different from ['consent', 'consent_login']. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-23.name: 35 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (redirect_uri is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-23.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because redirect_uri is not present. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-24.name: 36 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (redirect_uri is not trusted)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-24.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because redirect_uri is not trusted. Expected error is Error on OP

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-25.name: 37 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (acr_values is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-25.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because acr_values is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-26.name: 38 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (values of acr_values are different from ['https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1', 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL2', 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL3'])
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-26.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because values of acr_values are different from ['https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1', 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL2', 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL3']. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-27.name: 39 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (claims is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-27.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because claims is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-28.name: 40 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (claims value is not in the expected form)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-28.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because claims value is not in the expected form. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-29.name: 41 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (claims are requested into id_token)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-29.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because claims are requested into id_token. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-30.name: 42 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (requested claims are not valid)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-30.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because requested claims are not valid. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-31.name: 43 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (state is not present)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-31.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because state is not present. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-wrong-request-32.name: 44 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Authentication Request (state length is less than 32 chars)
test-case-oidc-wrong-request-32.description: Executes an incorrect OIDC Authorization Code request because state length is less than 32 chars. Expected error 'invalid_request'

test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-1.name: 45 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Userinfo Request (the request is sent using HTTP method different from GET)
test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-1.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 2. Send incorrect Userinfo Request because the request is sent using HTTP method different from GET

test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-2.name: 46 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Userinfo Request (the bearer token for authorization is not valid)
test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-2.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 2. Send incorrect Userinfo Request because the bearer token for authorization is not valid

test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-3.name: 47 - Test Case OIDC Wrong Userinfo Request (the bearer token for authorization is expired or revoked)
test-case-oidc-core-userinfo-wrong-3.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for SPID Level 2. Wait untill the access token will be expired or revoke it. Then send a correct Userinfo Request with the expired or revoked bearer token. Expected result is an Error Userinfo Response.

test-case-user-interface-1.name: UI1 - User try to login with wrong credentials
test-case-user-interface-1.description: Executes a correct OIDC Authorization Code request. User try to login with wrong credentials. Access is denied on OP

test-case-user-interface-2.name: UI2 - User try to login with credentials not allowed on the requested acr level
test-case-user-interface-2.description: Executes a correct OIDC Authorization Code request. User try to login with credentials not allowed on the requested acr level. Access is denied on OP

test-case-user-interface-3.name: UI3 - OP MUST show consent view to user
test-case-user-interface-3.description: Executes a correct OIDC Authorization Code request. OP MUST show consent view to user

test-case-user-interface-4.name: UI4 - User try to login with suspended credentials
test-case-user-interface-4.description: Executes a correct OIDC Authorization Code request. User try to login with suspended credentials. Access is denied on OP

test-case-user-interface-5.name: UI5 - User try to login with revoked credentials
test-case-user-interface-5.description: Executes a correct OIDC Authorization Code request. User try to login with revoked credentials. Access is denied on OP

test-case-attribute-authority-0.name: AA1 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint.
test-case-attribute-authority-0.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. After user authentication, IdP show AA selection and asks the user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA.

test-case-attribute-authority-1.name: AA2 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User does not select any AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-1.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User does not select any AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is not required.

test-case-attribute-authority-2.name: AA3 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User select at least one AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-2.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User select at least one AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is required to continue.

test-case-attribute-authority-3.name: AA4 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User select all AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-3.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User select all AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is required to continue.

test-case-attribute-authority-4.name: AA5 - The request is correct and at least one value of location of the required attribute authority in authorization_details is not empty and is present in the SPID OIDC Registry at the entity listing endpoint. User deselect all AA.
test-case-attribute-authority-4.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is valid. User deselect all AA. The ask to user for consent to grant the SP to query the selected AA is not required.

test-case-attribute-authority-5.name: AA6 - The request is correct but authorization_details is malformed.
test-case-attribute-authority-5.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, authorization_details is not valid.

test-case-attribute-authority-6.name: AA7 - The request is correct but authorization_details contains only one location that is not trusted.
test-case-attribute-authority-6.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The authorization request is correct, prompt=consent login, scope=openid, acr_values=https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1, attribute authority location is not trusted.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-1 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection for given grant token is correct.
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the introspection request for given grant token. Expected result is active=true.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-2 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection for grant token is correct but the token is expired so the introspection response return active=false.
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The grant_token received expires after few seconds or must be revoked. Wait for token expiration, then send the introspection request for the expired grant token. Expected result is active=false.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-3 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection for grant token is correct but the token has been revoked so the introspection response return active=false.
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. The grant_token received is being revoked. Send the introspection request for the revoked grant token. Expected result is active=false.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-1 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection for given grant token is wrong - the request is sent using HTTP method different from POST.
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the request is sent using HTTP method different from POST. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-2 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - parameter client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because parameter client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-3 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of client_assertion is not a valid JWT
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of client_assertion is not a valid JWT. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-4 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the signature of client_assertion JWT is not valid
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the signature of client_assertion JWT is not valid. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-5 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim iss in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim iss in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-6 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of iss in the client_assertion is different from the value of client_id
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of iss in the client_assertion is different from the value of client_id. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-7 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim sub in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim sub in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-8 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of sub in the client_assertion is different from the value of iss
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of sub in the client_assertion is different from the value of iss. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-9 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim aud in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim aud in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-10 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of aud in the client_assertion is different from the URL of introspection endpoint
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of aud in the client_assertion is different from the URL of introspection endpoint. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-11 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim iat in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim iat in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-12 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of iat is not a valid unix time
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of iat is not a valid unix time. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-13 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of iat is > current date + 3min
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of iat is > current date + 3min. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-14 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim exp in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim exp in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-15 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of exp is not a valid unix time
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of exp is not a valid unix time. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-16 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of exp is < current date+3min
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of exp is < current date+3min. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-17 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the claim jti in the client_assertion is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the claim jti in the client_assertion is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-18 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of jti is less of 16 byte length
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of jti is less of 16 byte length. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-19 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - parameter client_assertion_type is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because parameter client_assertion_type is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-20 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of client_assertion_type is different from 'urn:ietf:params:oauth:client-assertion-type:jwt-bearer'
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of client_assertion_type is different from 'urn:ietf:params:oauth:client-assertion-type:jwt-bearer'. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-21 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - parameter client_id is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because parameter client_id is not present. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-22 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - the value of client_id is not trusted
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because the value of client_id is not trusted. Expected result is Response Error.

test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.name: AA-introspection-wrong-23 - The request for Attribute Authority is correct. The introspection request for grant token is wrong - parameter token is not present
test-case-attribute-authority-introspect.description: Executes the basic OIDC Authorization Code Flow for Attribute Authority. Then send the wrong introspection request because parameter token is not present. Expected result is Response Error.
